cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ` c1)=(c0 `(c1[sSet]< c2, c3 >))
⊣ c0 = Slot((c0 ` ndx))
⊣ (c0 ` ndx)≠ c2
⊣ Rel(dom(sSet))
